mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter from Jennie Howard to Dr. Thomas Henry Howard Dated July 13, 1869
mdRecord.dcterms:description: A personal correspondence from Jennie Howard, dated July 13, 1869, to her brother in law Dr. Thomas Henry Howard. She writes that there is much activity keeping them busy this summer, including concerts, celebrations, and parties. She shares general family updates about where relatives are staying and traveling to. She shares that her daughter Lillie thinks of her Uncle Henry all the time, and expresses that he must come visit soon.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Courting
Doctors

Farm crops
